Package org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor

Class AutomatonCanvas.MyIdleDrawer

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.draw.AbstractDrawer
org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor.AutomatonCanvas.MyIdleDrawer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, Drawer
Enclosing class:
AutomatonCanvas<T extends Automaton>
class AutomatonCanvas.MyIdleDrawer
extends AbstractDrawer
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
This is a drawer that can paint information about the state under the mouse cursor when the mouse is idle.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
